snippet.title: HorrorDriven: A story for the road - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist and play the demo on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1648990/HorrorDriven_A_story_for_the_road/
Release date: 22 October 2024!!!
HorrorDriven is an atmospheric horror game set in a radioactive and paranormal zone that you can explore both by car and on foot. Core features: A dynamic world with roaming creatures and supernatural dangers, an old car as a mobile base on your journey, survival mechanics, crafting, puzzles, scares & much more!
